result.purpose: This file is a command-line tool for decoding HCL (HashiCorp Configuration Language) files based on a specified specification.
side_effects: Reads from standard input if no HCL files are provided.
Writes output to standard output or a specified file.
risks: Potential for command injection if user input is not properly sanitized.
File handling errors if the specified files do not exist or are inaccessible.
